hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/b1ec473b6fdb45093a292fcb77cfcaf9.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{?} \text{ family presents}\\
+&\underline{ \blue{8} \text{ friend presents }}\\
=&\pink{18} \text{ presents in total}\end{align}$

question.content:
Danny bought $18$ presents. He gave some to his family and the other $8$ to his friends.

 **How many presents did Danny give his family? **

[[☃ input-number 1]] presents
